metadata.title: CVE-2017-14639 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: AP4_VisualSampleEntry::ReadFields in Core/Ap4SampleEntry.cpp in Bento41.5.0-617 uses incorrect character data types, which causes a stack-basedbuffer underflow and out-of-bounds write, leading to denial of service(application crash) or possibly unspecified other impact.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
